Jeremy,
 
Like I said there is no need for that fancy setup.
Just use the =
box and a digital voice recorder next to it and do your session.
 
Do one 5=
 minute session like that and send it to me, I would like to hear what a pl=
ain session 
with your signal sounds like without direct recording or more =
than one box.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ec=
uyler@...: Tue, 29 Jan 2008 01:21:04 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: =
New file uploaded to EVP-ITC




Bruce, I used an older 12-469, the gray an=
d white one. I had ithooked up to a Behringer Xenyx 1622FX mixer along with=
 a Shure SM58microphone running to the computer and recorded in Audacity. I=
 live in Dayton, Ohio. There there are a handful of AM stationsaround. The =
most prominent being 700 WLW out of Cincinnati. Theproblem I've run into is=
 that the stations that come in clearly startanywhere from 2-4 bands before=
 and after their actual frequency.I also have a RS 20-125. I'm getting read=
y to do another session in afew minutes so I'll use the 20-125. I know it p=
robably won't makemuch of a difference as far as signal goes, but I'm gonna=
 try it out.Jeremy--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday<paranormal=
investigating@...> wrote:>> > Jeremy,> > Are you using a 12-469 or 470 ?> I=
f you are using a 469, what is the set up> are you recording directly from =
the box and > using a splitter with a speaker attached ?> > Or recording fr=
om the stand alone 470?> > The reason I ask is because other than the singl=
e word response you> are receiving, I hear no indication of the RS box swee=
ping the stations.> It is all static noise except for the message. > > You =
are not getting any signal at all.> you should be hearing the different sta=
tions change and continuousfragments of speech> while the box sweeps the ba=
nd.> > Let me know where you are and how you are setting up for a session.I=
f you are getting that response without any clear signal> think of how you =
will communicate with even a half way decent signal.> > Bruce> Bruce Hallid=
ay > > > From: EVP-ITC@...: EVP-ITC@...: Mon, 28 Jan 2008 22:50:54+0000Subj=
ect: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC> > > > > Hello,This email messa=

es area of the EVP-ITC group.File :/Jeremy's Files/Session 1 review_what is=
